Question: This person was born and raised in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
Hints: Dyson suggested this person's comments "betray classist, elitist viewpoints rooted in generational warfare.".
Twenty-two-year-old Autumn Jackson was sentenced to 26 months in jail for trying to extort $40 million from this person.
In addition, this person in 1998 became the host of Kids Say the Darndest Things.
